xtc.lang.cpp

Class TokenFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • xtc.lang.cpp.TokenFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Stream

    public class TokenFilter
extends Object
implements Stream
    A stream that filters out all tokens except for regular and compound tokens.
